item.title: Blockchain Security, Part 1
item.description: In this episode, Corey, Dee and Jessie talk to Head of Engineering at Ava Labs, Patrick O’Grady.

item.title: Personals - David Theodore
item.description: David Theodore, Security Researcher at Ethereum, talks about the merge and his path from electrical engineering to security.
